verse: विज्ञानं ब्रह्मेति व्यजानात्‌।विज्ञानाद्‌ध्येव खल्विमानि भूतानि जायन्ते।विज्ञानेन जातानि जीवन्ति।विज्ञानं प्रयन्त्यभिसंविशन्तीति। तद्विज्ञाय।पुनरेव वरुणं पितरमुपससार। अधीहि भगवो ब्रह्मेति।तं होवाच। तपसा ब्रह्म विजिज्ञासस्व। तपो ब्रह्मेति।स तपोऽतप्यत। स तपस्तप्त्वा॥

terms.वरुणं: to Varuna (a deity associated with cosmic order)

meaning: Translation:By knowledge, one should understand that knowledge is indeed Brahman. Through knowledge, all beings are born, and through knowledge, they live. They pursue knowledge and enter into it. That is the knowledge that should be known. Once again, he (Varuna) approached his father Varuna and said, "O revered one, teach me Brahman." His father replied, "Austerity is Brahman." He (Varuna) practiced austerity and having undergone austerity.
